detailsData.title: Experienced Representation
detailsData.content: With nearly a century of experience, we offer strategic and focused representation for our clients.

detailsData.title: Specialized Expertise
detailsData.content: We have unparalleled expertise in defending lawyers, judges, design professionals, and other professionals.

detailsData.title: Client Range
detailsData.content: From large firms to solo practitioners, we represent a diverse range of clients across various sectors.

address: 465 California Street 5th Floor, San Francisco, CA 94104
valueProp: Long & Levit, LLP is a premier law firm with a nearly century-long history of providing strategic and experienced representation to a diverse range of clients. With specialized expertise in defending professionals and a client range from large firms to solo practitioners, we are committed to delivering focused legal services.
